resume.name: BRADLEY HOLCOMB
experience: Independent Market Researcher: Conducted a deep-dive analysis of consumer behavior trends within the e-commerce sector, focusing on the impact of social proof on conversion rates.
Competitive Analysis Project: Developed a comprehensive 50-page report evaluating the digital marketing strategies of top-tier SaaS competitors, identifying key gaps in SEO and content positioning.

Target Audience Segmentation Study: Leveraged primary and secondary research data to define three primary customer personas for the emerging green-tech market, including psychographic profiling and media consumption habits.
